title: Dechibica
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Japanese, Organic, Take-out, Asian Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. One of the owners at this bright cafe is vegan. Makes a variety of organic food inspired by different countries in Asia. Vegan suitable curries include the pumpkin curry, yellow chickpea curry, and avocado curry. Other vegan items include a bibimbap, Singapore tofu rice, taco rice made with tofu "meat," a pho, and cookies. Sometimes makes waffles which are always vegan. Could get mango lassi with soy milk. Kitchen stops one hour before closing.
